name: Gunning Over It
description:
This is a recreation of Danial Jumagaliyev's game for the Friday Night Game Jam. Made in 3 hours. *PLAY IN FULLSCREEN FOR BEST EXPERIENCE*

Art assets made by Kenny: https://www.kenney.nl/assets/bit-pack

Code and animations made by me.

Controls are very basic, mouse to aim and left click to shoot.

Hope you enjoy my game!
